title: Educational Building Toys STEM Learning Kit, 10 in 1 Construction Blocks for Preschool Kids, Engineering Toys Creative Set for Kids, Boys Age 5 6 7 8 9 10+ Years Old
features: 10 in 1 DIY Building Groups 一 This easy-to-build construction set sparks imagination, offers endless build-and-play fun. An action-packed construction site play kit, it features a bulldozer, a toy crane, a forklift, a wind mill, a gantry crane, a carrier vehicle, rotary crane

Easy to Assemble and Organize 一 The building sets come with tools and clear step-by-step guide with photos of the models that can be followed. Player can entertains himself by building toys independently.

STEM Education Through Playing 一 Fun and interesting educational toys are designed to improve your children's Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math skills through playing. Keeping children engaging for 1-2 hours each day can enhance his concentration and hand-eye coordination, develop their independent, confident and practical ability.

Different Levels of Challenges 一 10 different designs can be built with 108 pieces of construction blocks. Perfect learning games for classroom kindergarten or home, bringing more fun for 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 10+ years old boys and girls.
Wonderful Gift 一 Kids can create an action-filled holiday, birthday or any day gift for kids ages 5+ who like construction trucks, bulldozers and crane toys
description: Product Description Practical DIY Learning Game Keeping children engaging for 1-2 hours can improve his concentration and hand-eye coordination, develop their independent, confident and practical ability. Teamwork awareness improving Multiple children to play together, facilitate their cooperation with other kids, enhancing their sense of cooperation and sharing. Logical Training This educational toy contains 108 pieces of building blocks can build 10 kinds of creation toys. Different level of challenges can improve children's logical thinking and problem-solving ability. Makes a Great Gift Idea HomeTTER concentrates on giving each girl and boy a happy childhood all the time. Make a great choice for kids on holiday, birthday, Christmas. Arouses Kids' Interest of Learning This creative toy is both educational and fun and entertains your kids quite some time. Kids will get achievement when they finish different designs.
